name: Soccer Dribble Cup: high score
description:
Beware, your opponents not only stand one on one... They gonna keep forming new tactics and formations to surprise you.

Not only defenders but goal keepers will be there to stop you from what you are best at: DRIBBLE!!!

Also, being famous has its own problem, your fan - the cheerleader gonna chase you across the field.

Far from the starting point... you may encounter the deadly referee... Remember to avoid his yellow and red cards!

If you meet the marketing man on your way, check out his offer to get coins for watching ads.

But don't be so serious: Enjoy soccer, enjoy the run... on phone, tablet or Watch

Credit:
- Blocked font by @ProtractorNinja, 04b19 by Yuji Oshimoto
- Voice clips recorded and performed by Aimee Smith
- Music by Snabisch
- Sound by: www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com

From Cakeogame with love,
P/S: when play on watch, sound on for extra fun!!!
